frontmatter.title: Backup and recovery
frontmatter.description: IBM Fusion provides backup and recovery for container workloads and virtual machines running in Red Hat OpenShift.

internal.content:
---
title: Backup and recovery
description: IBM Fusion provides backup and recovery for container workloads and virtual machines running in Red Hat OpenShift.
tabs: [Overview, Resources]
---

<PageDescription>

More ways to explore

</PageDescription>

<AnchorLinks>
  <AnchorLink>Articles and blogs</AnchorLink>
  <AnchorLink>Videos</AnchorLink>
</AnchorLinks>

## Articles and blogs

<Row className="resource-card-group-3-across">
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="How Fusion simplifies backup/restore - part 1 (why is this so complex?)"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/jim-smith/2023/07/27/ibm-storage-fusion-backup-restore-recipe-1?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="How Fusion simplifies backup/restore - part 2 (orchestration and Recipes)"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/jim-smith/2023/08/01/how-ibm-storage-fusion-simplifies-backup-and-recov?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="How Fusion simplifies backup/restore - part 3 (Recipe deep dive)"
      actionIcon="launch"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/jim-smith/2023/08/04/how-ibm-storage-fusion-simplifies-backup-and-recov?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row className="resource-card-group-3-across">
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Data protection as code"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/greg-deffenbaugh/2023/06/22/data-protection-as-code?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title=" Fusion Recipe Tips - How to Identify All Resources of an Application"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/sandeep-prajapati/2024/01/21/identify-application-resources-for-backup-and-reco?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Recipe updates"
      actionIcon="launch"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/jim-smith/2024/01/12/ibm-storage-fusion-backup-and-restore-orchestratio?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row className="resource-card-group-3-across">
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Backup and restore for Red Hat Quay"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/ke-zhao-li/2024/01/03/fusion-backup-restore-for-quay?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title=" Using Fusion backup alongside global AMQ"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/dan-dan-wang/2023/12/12/how-to-install-fusion-backuprestore-service-coexis?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Backup as code"
      actionIcon="launch"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/jc-lopez/2023/06/07/ibm-storage-fusion-backup-as-code?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row className="resource-card-group-3-across">
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Backup & Restore in a Disconnected OpenShift Environment for IBM LinuxONE"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/ibmz-and-linuxone/viewdocument/ibm-storage-fusion-backup-restore?CommunityKey=2a2f855c-5950-4a9d-8485-86645982646a"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Backup for IBM Cloud Pak for AIOps"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://medium.com/ibm-watson-aiops/new-backup-and-restore-capabilities-with-ibm-cloud-pak-for-aiops-4-5-0-53100b0ac65d"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="OpenShift Virtualization - Backup and restore use cases with IBM Fusion FAQ"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/jim-smith/2024/07/10/openshift-virtualization-backup-and-restore-use-ca"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
</Row>

## Videos

<Row>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="Using IBM Fusion to backup an application"
  subTitle="Demo"
  href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=__KEsyqwYJg"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![watsonx.ai](/images/tutorial.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="Backup and restore of IBM watsonx.data "
  subTitle="Demo"
  href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rCMLB0mgYiI"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![watsonx.data](/images/watsonx-data.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="Managing backup as code"
  subTitle="Demo"
  href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pv_1i_ki3T0"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![watsonx.governance](/images/backup-as-code.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="Backup and restore of IBM Cloud Pak for Data"
  subTitle="Demo"
  href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wmbC73lWSoM"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![watsonx.ai](/images/cloud-pak-for-data.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
</Row>
